summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3826 for the improvement of North 41st Street, from Fremont Avenue to Dayton Avenue; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 47017, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
